posts.caption: www.codinghorror.com
posts.description: I've been a Microsoft developer for decades now. I weaned myself on various flavors of home computer Microsoft Basic, and I got my first paid programming gigs in Microsoft FoxPro, Microsoft Access, and Microsoft Visual Basic. I have seen the future of programming, my friends, and it is terrible CRUD...

posts.description: Answer (1 of 239): The interviewer, a very senior technical guy, asked me, "So, do you have any questions for me?" I thought about it for a moment and said, "What's the worst thing about working here?" He thought about it for a minute, then got up and closed his door, and told me. For like half...

اللقاء الأسبوعي للمطورين المصريين و مجموعة Ask Developer على Google+ Hangout 
اللقاء يوم السبت الموافق 11 مايو 2013
الساعة 8 مساءً بتوقيت القاهرة

"Al Quran Al Kareem" 
My latest Windows Store App for windows 8. The First Place Winner for February "Windows 8 Best Apps Contest" .. CodeVNext http://www.codevnext.com/contests/windows-8-best-apps-contest .. 

Install it and enjoy listening to Al Quran Al Kareem with the most popular reciters  :)
